Articles.Content:
Once a ship is launched, the game seems to be always stuck in accelerated physics mode.

I am using the 32bit version with no mods.

Edited October 8, 2014 by sysigy
I've had a similair issue in .24 and i couldn't drop out of physics warp using , and . although it worked with the mouse cklicking at the top right at physWarp 1
Since deleting the KSP_Win folder and re-extracting from the .zip to fix my low quality texture issue this seems to have also fixed my physics warp bug also.
